entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 11:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

Temperature: -33.5°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %

Dewpoint: -36.7°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 45 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
